messages.body:
$PBR $TOT Golar Power offers top bid for Petrobras LNG terminal - Reuters 

https://newsfilter.io/a/cd3a7321c540bd16606de7fb4e84cdca

links.title: Golar Power offers top bid for Petrobras LNG terminal - Reuters
links.description: Golar Power has submitted the top bid for a highly pursued liquefied natural gas import terminal being leased by Petrobras, although the bid may be thrown out on compliance related grounds, Reuters reports.Golar Power reportedly was the top offer out of 12 companies applied to submit offers, including local subsidiaries of BP, Total and Repsol.The terminal and regasification facility was offered under a wider government effort to end state-run Petrobras' Brazil monopoly in natural gas imports and processing.The chief executive of another Golar LNG-Stonepeak venture, Hygo Energy Transition, stepped down this week after being cited in a bribery investigation.

messages.body:
$PBR Petrobras agrees on 4.3B reais tax amnesty program 

https://newsfilter.io/a/d96821d1537e4edb0f5ada8edae1b452

links.title: Petrobras agrees on 4.3B reais tax amnesty program
links.description: Petrobras says its board has approved an agreement to settle 4.3B reais of fines and interest related to disputed tax payments.Under the terms of the agreement, Petrobras will pay 2B reais combined to the Rio de Janeiro and Espirito Santo states to settle total contingencies of 4.3B reais.Separately, Brazil's Supreme Court voted to allow Petrobras to sell eight refineries without the approval of Congress.The divestitures are expected to raise billions of dollars for Petrobras and are key for the company's debt reduction goals.Petrobras recently predicted proceeds of $1B from divestments in 2020, after receiving $14.4B from asset sales in 2019.

messages.body: $PBR good or bad news?

Brazilian Supreme Court Justice Votes Against Petrobras Refinery Sales, Court Now 5 To 4 In Favor Of Divestments; Sixth Brazilian Supreme Court Justice Votes In Favor Of Allowing Petrobras To Sell Refineries, Divestments Now Officially Approved By Court

Related Tickers: $PBR
